text: Patricia Anthony (January 3, 1947 â€“ August 2, 2013) was an American science fiction and slipstream author. She published her first science fiction novel, Cold Allies, in 1992. Other novels include The Happy Policeman and Brother Termite. She was born in San Antonio, Texas. She died at age sixty-six.
